command_list.command: item replace entity @s[tag=!1,tag=!2,tag=!3,tag=!4,tag=!5] armor.head with minecraft:iron_helmet

item replace entity @s weapon.offhand with minecraft:ender_pearl

execute at @s run particle minecraft:item golden_apple ^ ^1.5 ^0.5 0 0 0 0.01 10
